summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDerma E's No-Dark-Circles Perfecting Eye Cream is infused with antioxidant-rich Vitamin C, brightening Turmeric, Mica, and de-puffing Caffeine to instantly color-correct for brighter eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsColor correct and diminish the look of dark circles, fine lines, and puffiness around the delicate under-eye areaEnriched with Turmeric, Mica, and nourishing antioxidants to provide the skin with essential hydration and leaves an overall brighter complexionFormulated with Caffeine to help reduce puffiness and dark circles and leave eyes looking energized. Ideal for all skin types with puffy eyes, discoloration, or fine lines around the eye area. Comes in an easy to use ball-tip applicatorFeaturesRecyclable & wind energy certifiedFormulated without GMOs, gluten, or soyKey IngredientsVitamin C: Helps support collagen health, improving the appearance of sun-damaged skin and brightens the skinCaffeine: Helps reduce puffiness and dark circlesGolden Turmeric: Helps reduce the appearance of blemishes and embraces the skin's natural glowItem 2552784How To UseGently squeeze a small amount of product onto applicator tip. Swipe in circular motion around eye area, including lids. Use finger to smooth in any excess until absorbed.IngredientsPurified Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate, Stearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Titanium Dioxide, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Mica, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Sclerotium Gum, Lecithin, Pullulan, Asparagopsis Armata Extract, Caffeine, Jojoba Esters, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Steviol Glycoside/Curcuma Long (Tumeric) Root Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycolipids, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Spirulina, Lavendula Angustifolia Oil, Citrus Aurantium, Citrus Grandis.
how_to_use: Gently squeeze a small amount of product onto applicator tip. Swipe in circular motion around eye area, including lids. Use finger to smooth in any excess until absorbed.

reviews.headline: Don't do it
reviews.comments: Just go with a normal cream. This product dries and flakes

reviews.headline: Don't buy if you don't want pilling
reviews.comments: I was really excited about this product because I love derma-e as a brand, but I really did not enjoy using it. The "color-correcting" was not real and the pigment broke apart and pilled on my face. This product is sitting on my counter now because I don't want to waste the money spent and don't even feel like giving it away would be kind to them.

reviews.headline: its a concealer not a skincare product
reviews.comments:
it has ingredients like a skincare product but it covers like a makeup concealer that doesn't really blend well. I made sure I warmed the product in-between my fingers and when I dabbed it under my eyes before blending it all and it still was pilling on me.
If your skincare is mostly water-based serums, moisturizers and toners I say pass on this. This does not sit on the skin well with water based skincare products since it's a very oil-based product. A little goes a long way but a lot comes out when you squeeze it. Make sure to shake it before using it also because some separation happens in the tube.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: It is not  helping

reviews.headline: gummy pilling
reviews.comments: doesn't absorb. pills up even with no other skincare or makeup. only using overnight to use up the tube.

reviews.headline: Trash
reviews.comments: Don't purchase

reviews.headline: Do Not Buy
reviews.comments: Trust all the reviewsâ€”this product is terrible

reviews.headline: Not happy at all
reviews.comments: I wish something like this had expiration dates because I feel like my product was so old. I looked at it and it was all clumpy, and then I tried to shake it out and the first thing that came out was oil. I used very little under my eyes at first, but it never covered the dark spots and within a few seconds, it started to make little flakes under my eyes. it's awful.

reviews.headline: Terrible!
reviews.comments: It clumps into yellow pieces under the eyes

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: Very flaky and doesnt absorb into the skin. It doesnt mix well with other products/makeup, but the slight tint did help with darkness.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't ever buy again
reviews.comments: The consistency was already weird when I squeezed some product iut and i noticed oil coming out, so i had to shake it a lot for it to come out evenly. Then once applied to undereyes it wouldnt really even make a difference at all and it would be flaky and rub off. It was a waste of money.

reviews.headline: don't recommend
reviews.comments: I've tried so many undereye creams for dark circles, this was probably the worse one. it has a tint like a concealer but as you try to "blend" it in it leaves a flaky dry look

reviews.headline: So liquidy!!
reviews.comments: It did an alright job of covering circles during the day with its color correction, but as I didn't use it for that long I am not sure about its long term benefits. It smells like tumeric, and it will still smell that way all day. VERY, very liquidy. I would put a finger over the applicator so that it doesn't get all over your face, because if you try to apply it with the applicator, that might happen. Maybe it's because I took a trip in very high altitude with it, but one day (once I got back) it wouldn't stop coming out of the container, and it was so messy that I had to throw it away. I'm so glad it was on sale so that I didn't waste too much money on it.

reviews.headline: I will buy this again and again
reviews.comments: Works amazing and my friends and family have noticed. Even my husband!!

reviews.headline: placebo affect
reviews.comments: i feel like because of the tumeric i was like this has to work and believed it worked at first and then realized how itchy it made my eyes wvery time I put it on and just came to realize it did nothing. I really expected it to work. dissapointed.

reviews.headline: It's like a concealer
reviews.comments: This cream brightened my dark circles. It had tumeric and it was like a concealer. I can leave it overnight.

reviews.headline: There is nothing positive about this product
reviews.comments: Bought this product as I like the company and it was on sale so thought I would give it a try. It doesn't blend well at all and I don't like how it settles after it dries.

reviews.headline: Burned my eyes
reviews.comments: I tried this product several times.  At first, I thought I must have gotten it to close to my eye lid and that's what caused the irritation.  The next two times, it burned my eyes and caused watering as well to the point I had to wash my face.

reviews.headline: SUPER watery and messy
reviews.comments: This product pills quite a bit and is unexpectedly super watery. It's hard to only squeeze out a tiny bit because as soon as you open it up and flip it over to use, it starts spilling out (even after shaking). This makes the applicator itself super messy. I will continue to use the rest as it's not unusable, but I will not be repurchasing nor would I recommend.

reviews.headline: Nothing Special
reviews.comments: A strangely watery consistency. No particular beneficial effects.

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Wasn't expecting it to be tinted.
Does not mix well with other moisturizer

display_values: Does not mix well with other moisturizer
Wasn't expecting it to be tinted.

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: I have oily and sensitive skin type
Oily skin, sensitive skin, dark/deep skintone

display_values: I have oily and sensitive skin type
Oily skin, sensitive skin, dark/deep skintone

faceoff_positive.comments: I was skeptical using this product because of the reviews. I was expecting a thick, cream like consistency, something close to mimicking a concealer. I have the habit of always using more then what you need. So naturally I over did it with the amount I applied the first time and it was a mess! I was very disappointed because I had high hopes for this product. The next morning I tried a pea size amount to cover both eyes and it absorbed beautifully into my skin! I tapped it onto my skin with my ringer finger and it went in nicely. Turmeric is yellow and stains, hence the color of the product, which is why a little goes a long way. Overall I have been using this product for 1 week both in the AM and PM and I have been noticing a difference, my dark circles are definitely lighter!
faceoff_positive.headline: A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY!

faceoff_negative.comments: I guess what they meant by "works instantly" is that this acts like a concealer.  It is not really cream-like, its drying.   It feels heavy, thick, smells like sun screen and is highly pigmented, just like a concealer.  The applicator is almost exactly like a tube of lip gloss.  You dont need much , but because its not creamy, it wont spread well, be-careful when dispensing because the applicator dispenses to much at once.  Since i am not that  light skinned, this product is not for me.  i was hoping for a serum or smooth cream, and what i got was more of a make-up product and a product that severely disappoints.
faceoff_negative.headline: Please read.
